edu.umn.biomedicus.utilities

Class PtbReader

  • edu.umn.biomedicus.utilities.PtbReader

  • public class PtbReader

    Class for parsing penn treebank style parse trees into a structured tree.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  PtbReader.Node
      A node in a penn treebank tree. For the node "(NNS patients)" the parent is the immediate node containing that node, the children are empty, the label is
